sub_title_h3: We are the Grama Sevakha Niladhari division of Udapalatha GS wasama under the Kandy Division Secretariate.
form_body: You can now download all your necessary documents and forms online without having to go to GS office. Isn’t it time saving?
download_body: You can now download all your necessary documents and forms online without having to go to GS office. Isn’t it time saving?kjhgf
project_details: Take a look at the projects that are happening in your neighbourhood. There is so much that we can do as a community to help each other out for the welfare of everyone.
project_body: Take a look at the projects that are happening in your neighbourhood. There is so much that we can do as a community to help each other out for the welfare of everyone.
resource_details_body: In need of resource materials for your on-going projects or inventions? We are here to provide and facilitate your small scale businesses.
resource_body: In need of resource materials for your on-going projects or inventions? We are here to provide and facilitate your small scale businesses.
schedule_appointment: Schedule appoitnments according to your convenience with your GS
make_appointment_body: Waiting in like to meet your GS could be frustrating and time consuming. Why not schedule your meeting with the GS online. This will help you save a lot of time.
donation: Make donations and become a donor!
donation_make: Interested in our projects and our community? Lend a helping hand for the small scale businesses and new inventions by making a generous donation.
donate_body: Interested in our projects and our community? Lend a helping hand for the small scale businesses and new inventions by making a generous donation.
forum_body: Join the discussions and be a part of the active community. Share your ideas and your thoughts with us.
forum_discussion_body: Join the discussions and be a part of the active community. Share your ideas and your thoughts with us.
